Name: First Laugh
Description: At the start of the first|turn[;] inflict [weaken]2 weaken

Name: First Laugh_upgraded
Description: At the start of the first|turn[;] inflict [weaken]3 weaken
Script: On Start Turn: if(turn == 1 # turn == 2) { e.animate(~flashandshake~); inflictself(DODGE|1);  sfx(~_dodge~); if(turn == 2){e.changecolour(~GRAY~);} }

Name: Lengthy Screaming
Reason for removing: 4 weaken is an awful lot as PU Witch

Name: Horrific Yodeling
Reason for removing: Ok; now 4 weaken is the BASE amount here; and spending just 4 mana adds 4 extra weaken. I think I get why terry removed loud yelling (aside from just the name sounding funny).

Name: Soul Crushing Beatboxing
Description: Cost [mana]3: inflict [weaken]<var:beatboxing>[;] 1 per|each card used this turn
Reason for removing: Magnifying Glass+ says hi. And Doppel+. And Duplicate. And basically any other equipment that can be infinitely reused with zero net loss.
Script: On Execute: if(getstatusself(MANA) > 2) { removestatusself(MANA|3); inflict(WEAKEN|self.getvar(~beatboxing~)); } else{ self.textparticle(~No effect!~); sfx(~_whoosh~); }

Name: Recurring Dream
Description: Do [sword]<d6> damage|In [jinx]2 turns[;] repeat this|[gray](once per battle)
Reason for removing: I had no idea how to implement this jinx and then someone beat me to the punch :(
Script: On Execute: jinx(~Recurring Dream~|~take [sword]%VAR% damage[;] repeat jinx~|~Take [sword]%VAR% damage[;] repeat jinx~|~doequipmentaction(target[;]self[;]self[;]%VAR%[;]0[;]false);~|target|self|2|d); attack(d); sfxdamage(null|d); sfx(~_thinghappens~);

Name: Drill
Reason for removing: Gong and Tetraphobia+ are well overpowered as-is; and we don't need more of those. (Also because someone already did "do 1 damage x times" - not Jackeea; surprisingly)
Script: On Execute: var i = d; while (i > 0) { attack(1); i--; }

Name: Malbolge
Description: Do some things depending|on some stuff
Reason for removing: Malbolge is an esolang that is as difficult as humanly possible to program in.
Script: On Execute: if(turn % 2 == self.hp % 2) { sfxdamage(999); } var t = 0; if(d % 3 == 2) { attackself(roboterror([self.equipment[0]]) + actualdice[1].basevalue + self.equipment[0].col * -1); } if(actualdice[0].blind == true) { inflict(~counter_~ + (target.hp % 7)); } if(actualdice[1].blind == true) { inflictself(~dice_trigger_~ + (self.hp % 7)); } if(actualdice[2].blind == true) { attack(self.dicepool.length + self.hp - target.hp|SHOCK); } if(self.status.length > d && self.dicepool.length > 0) { inflict(CURSE|self.dicepool[self.dicepool.length - 1]); } if(self.dicepool.length > 6 && self.hp % 2 == 0) { for(i in 1...self.dicepool.length - 6) { throwdice(self|target); } } else { for(mydice in self.dicepool) { if(mydice.basevalue == actualdice[0].basevalue && mydice.available()) { mydice.animatereroll(actualdice[2].basevalue| self.screenposition()| t * 0.05); t++; } } }

Name: White Picket Fence
Description: Add <d6> shield[;] bash with shield|[gray](once per battle)
Reason for removing: White Picket Fence was my attempt to start the next big hilarious Dicey meme in place of "Ye Olde Shielde Bashe". Guess how that went?
